# vscode

```go
{
    "configurations": [
    {
        "debugAdapter": "dlv-dap", // `legacy` by default
        "name": "Launch test function",
        "type": "go",
        "request": "launch",
        "program": "${workspaceFolder}",
    }
    ], // can skip for localhost
}
```
https://zenn.dev/msksgm/articles/20220104-vscode-go-cannot-debug
